property.name: zeppelin.server.addr
property.description: Server address

property.name: zeppelin.server.port
property.description: Server port

property.name: zeppelin.server.context.path
property.description: Context Path of the Web Application

property.name: zeppelin.notebook.dir
property.description: path or URI for notebook persist

property.name: zeppelin.notebook.homescreen
property.description: id of notebook to be displayed in homescreen. ex) 2A94M5J1Z Empty value displays default home screen

property.name: zeppelin.notebook.homescreen.hide
property.description: hide homescreen notebook from list when this value set to true

property.name: zeppelin.notebook.storage
property.description: versioned notebook persistence layer implementation

property.name: zeppelin.notebook.one.way.sync
property.description: If there are multiple notebook storages, should we treat the first one as the only source of truth?

property.name: zeppelin.interpreter.dir
property.description: Interpreter implementation base directory

property.name: zeppelin.interpreter.localRepo
property.description: Local repository for interpreter's additional dependency loading

property.name: zeppelin.interpreters
property.description: Comma separated interpreter configurations. First interpreter become a default

property.name: zeppelin.interpreter.connect.timeout
property.description: Interpreter process connect timeout in msec.

property.name: zeppelin.ssl
property.description: Should SSL be used by the servers?

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.client.auth
property.description: Should client authentication be used for SSL connections?

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.keystore.path
property.description: Path to keystore relative to Zeppelin configuration directory

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.keystore.type
property.description: The format of the given keystore (e.g. JKS or PKCS12)

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.keystore.password
property.description: Keystore password. Can be obfuscated by the Jetty Password tool

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.truststore.path
property.description: Path to truststore relative to Zeppelin configuration directory. Defaults to the keystore path

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.truststore.type
property.description: The format of the given truststore (e.g. JKS or PKCS12). Defaults to the same type as the keystore type

property.name: zeppelin.server.allowed.origins
property.description: Allowed sources for REST and WebSocket requests (i.e. http://onehost:8080,http://otherhost.com). If you leave * you are vulnerable to https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ZEPPELIN-173

property.name: zeppelin.anonymous.allowed
property.description: Anonymous user allowed by default

property.name: zeppelin.notebook.public
property.description: Make notebook public by default when created, private otherwise

property.name: zeppelin.websocket.max.text.message.size
property.description: Size in characters of the maximum text message to be received by websocket. Defaults to 1024000
